meanings.sent1: The school principal was the inaugurator of the new library.
meanings.sent2: The inaugurator of the event gave a heartfelt speech.
meanings.sent3: The inaugurator accidentally tripped on the stage, causing a moment of laughter.
meanings.sent4: She was the inaugurator of change in the community, sparking a wave of progress.
meanings.sent5: The inaugurator's presence filled the room with a sense of importance.

meanings.sent1: They will inaugurate the new building with a ribbon-cutting ceremony.
meanings.sent2: The President will inaugurate his second term in office next week.
meanings.sent3: The team decided to inaugurate their victory with a celebratory dinner.
meanings.sent4: Her speech will inaugurate a new era of collaboration among the departments.
meanings.sent5: The ringing of the bell will inaugurate the start of the school day.
